messages.text: Hi there, I'm Beatz Bot, BronyCon's Slack assistant!
I'm currently in development by @imjoshdean and @sheva. I can't do much just yet, I only update the chat topic and share random BronyCon channels you should visit.
Wanna help make me better? Check out my source and help! https://github.com/imjoshdean/beatz-bot
